subject: AI & Agents
title: Data Privacy: Minimize What You Send
description: A 60-second lesson on Data Privacy: Minimize What You Send.

hook.text: If you send everything, you leak something. Privacy is a design choice.

buildup.text: Agents touch emails, files, and customer data. Donâ€™t ship raw secrets to models.

discovery.text: Minimize: redact PII, summarize, and send only the fields needed for the step.

twist.text: More data rarely improves answers as much as better retrieval and structure.

climax.text: Add a â€œdata mapâ€: what leaves your system, why, and how itâ€™s protected.
